name: DPM Creative Group
tag_list: graphic-design, web-design, marketing, advertising, design-sydney, web-design-sydney, graphic-design-sydney, logos, corporate-identity, seo, illustration, arts, starting-an-art-gallery, opening-an-art-gallery, stationery, printing, catalogs, graphics-desi
overview: Established in 1999, DPM Creative Group is a boutique graphic design, web design, marketing and print company based in Sydney, Australia. Since early on they have aimed to offer their clients an agency style approach to their advertising and design needs while achieving budgets and keeping costs down. In 2001 they developed a Silver Sponsorship program with a focus on the arts industry and non-profit organizations. Since that time DPM has worked with several hundred artists and galleries helping them achieve their design and print collateral. They have also been invited to pitch for World AIDS day, worked for 2 years with M&G NSW and been invited to pitch for Australia’s Biennale. For a comprehensive list of clients and work, please contact them or visi8t their website.
